name: Collaborative Research through Projects
long_desc: This course has students engage in experiential learning via interdisciplinary projects around a variety of topics determined by each instructor. Students should review the lengthier description for each section posted on the Office of the Vice Provost for Education website httpswww.cmu.edueducationofficeresources99520courselistings.html

custom_fields.goals: Students will gain applied skills and knowledge based on the project deliverable for the course selection.
custom_fields.key_topics: Experiential learning, project development, project management
custom_fields.prerequisite_knowledge: This will be dependent upon each section and professors. Please see the course description listing on the VPE website under the Academic Resources heading.
custom_fields.assessment_structure: This will be dependent upon each section and professors. Please see the course listing on the VPE website under the Academic Resources heading.
custom_fields.relevance: This will focus on experiential learning and skill development related to the project focus.
custom_fields.learning_resources: This will be dependent upon each section and professors. Please see the course listing on the VPE website under the Academic Resources heading.
custom_fields.extra_time_commitment: This will be dependent upon each section and professors. Please see the course listing on the VPE website under the Academic Resources heading.
